issue.title: [C++] Fix arrow::parquet compiler warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7269](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7269). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Encountered the compiler warning when building:

[WARNING:/arrow/cpp/src/parquet/parquet.thrift:297] The "byte" type is a compatibility alias for "i8". Use "i8" to emphasize the signedness of this type.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7269?focusedCommentId=16983501) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
This file is vendored from Parquet's official repository. I'd open the fix there first, then vendor the new version.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7269?focusedCommentId=16987790) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5955
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5955>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7269?focusedCommentId=16987794) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Reopened, PR was for another issue.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7269?focusedCommentId=17010209) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
